Helium cross sections used by Boeuf & Marode in
"A Monte Carlo analysis of an electron swarm in a nonuniform
field: the cathode region of a glow discharge in helium"
1982 J. Phys. D: Appl. Phys. 15 2169
(http://iopscience.iop.org/0022-3727/15/11/012)


********************************************************** He **********************************************************
